          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Why brakes get hot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum Bremsen heiß erhalten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi les freins deviennent chauds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porque os freios começam quentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè i freni ottengono caldi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί τα φρένα ζεσταίνονται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Porqué los frenos consiguen calientes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the conversion of kinetic energy into thermal energy.  This makes the brakes get hotter.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brake</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">car</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slowing down</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Konvertierung der 
kinetischen Energie in thermische Energie. Dieses läßt die 
Bremsen heißer erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre la conversion de l'énergie 
cinétique dans l'énergie thermique. Ceci fait les freins 
obtenir plus chauds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a conversão da energia 
cinética na energia térmica. Isto faz os freios começar mais 
quentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la conversione di energia 
cinetica in energia termica. Ciò fa i freni ottenere più 
caldi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τη μετατροπή της 
κινητικής ενέργειας στη θερμική ενέργεια. Αυτό κάνει τα 
φρένα να ζεσταθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra la conversión de la 
energía cinética en energía termal. Esto hace que los frenos 
consiguen más calientes.</string>
          </description>
